channel.title: Pages on Conscientious Code
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Conscientious Code

item.title: Work
item.description: Loot Tracker View React Application with MongoDB Back-End Utility application to keep track of antiques and "loot" when shopping for the best deals. Idea for project came after trying to keep track of prices inside document became complicated. Content is served from back-end MongoDB database in the cloud and rendered on the front-end via ReactJS. In addition to listing products, locations and products, the application has the ability to add and edit existing data via a REST API created with NodeJS and Express.

item.title: Hello, I'm Patrick
item.description: I’m a Front-End Engineer who is driven to learn, create and explore with the web. My love for technology, art and science provide inspiration and creativity to my endeavors. My first computer was an Atari ST and some of my earliest and favorite memories are punching away on the keyboard while learning my first letters and words. I treasure the moments spent learning how this wonderful piece of circuitry and software came together.
